Line 106: Line 106:
*[[openSUSE]] - Version 10.1 of this Linux distribution contains out of the box support for Xgl and Compiz. Tutorials for using Xgl and Compiz on older SUSE Linux version are available at the OpenSUSE.org website. [http://www.opensuse.org]
*[[openSUSE]] - Version 10.1 of this Linux distribution contains out of the box support for Xgl and Compiz. Tutorials for using Xgl and Compiz on older SUSE Linux version are available at the OpenSUSE.org website. [http://www.opensuse.org]
*[[SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop]] - SLED 10 and newer include both Xgl and Compiz, along with an easy configuration panel icon to enable/disable the visual effects.
*[[SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop]] - SLED 10 and newer include both Xgl and Compiz, along with an easy configuration panel icon to enable/disable the visual effects.
â
*[[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]] - available in [http://www.ubuntu.com/ Ubuntu 6.06 LTS] and later from in the ''universe'' [[Advanced Packaging Tool|apt]] repository. A limited version is included by default as "Desktop-Effects" in Ubuntu 7.04 (Feisty Fawn). In Ubuntu 7.10 (Gutsy Gibbon) as well as Ubuntu 8.04 (Hardy Heron) Compiz Fusion is enabled by default. <ref>[http://arstechnica.com/journals/linux.ars/2007/09/12/ubuntu-technical-board-votes-on-compiz-for-ubuntu-7-10 Ubuntu Technical Board votes on Compiz for Ubuntu 7.10<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>.
+
*[[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] - available in [http://www.ubuntu.com/ Ubuntu 6.06 LTS] and later from in the ''universe'' [[Advanced Packaging Tool|apt]] repository. A limited version is included by default as "Desktop-Effects" in Ubuntu 7.04 (Feisty Fawn). In Ubuntu 7.10 (Gutsy Gibbon) as well as Ubuntu 8.04 (Hardy Heron) Compiz Fusion is enabled by default. <ref>[http://arstechnica.com/journals/linux.ars/2007/09/12/ubuntu-technical-board-votes-on-compiz-for-ubuntu-7-10 Ubuntu Technical Board votes on Compiz for Ubuntu 7.10<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>.
*[[Yoper]] - installed but not activated in a default installation as well as on version 3 - Titanum's live CD.
*[[Yoper]] - installed but not activated in a default installation as well as on version 3 - Titanum's live CD.
